message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, and I know you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product and am willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $13,750. This product is truly top-notch and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $13,500.
